page.title: 10BRECON'RADNOR BY-ELECTION
page.content: Beguildy is in the Brecon and Radnor Parliamentary Constituency and a few months before this survey was undertaken a by-election took place following the death of the member of parliament Mr. Tom Hooson. The election candidates were Richard Livsey- Liberal'SDP Alliance, Richard Willey- Labour, Christopher Butler- Conservative, Janet Davies- Plaid Cymru, Lord Sutch- Monster Raving Loony, Andre Genillard- Free the World from Multiple Sclerosis and Mr. Everest- Independent Conservative. The result was announced on the 5th July and was a victory for the Liberal'SDP Alliance candidate. Votes gained were: Livsey- 13753 Butler- 10631 Willey- 13194 Davies- 435 Sutch- 202 Everest- 154 Genillard- 43 Majority 559
